articles.title: Nine-year-old dies as Australia weekend drowning toll rises to seven - BBC
articles.description: The majority of deaths were caused by strong swells washing people into the ocean from rocks.
articles.content:
A nine-year-old boy who got trapped between rocks at a New South Wales beach on Sunday has become the seventh person to drown in Australia over the Easter weekend.
